communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm so sick of being rejected by women. It's always the same story - they just don't want a real man. They'd rather date some loser who doesn't even lift. I'm starting to think it's not even about me, it's about the system. It's rigged against guys like me.
narratives.p_intro: You think you're so much better than me with your 'feminism' and your 'equality'? Newsflash: women aren't equal to men. They're just pretending to be until they get what they want.
